Enum PickupGame.PlayMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PickupGame.PlayMode>
      • PickupGame.PlayMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PickupGame.PlayMode>
    Enclosing class:
    PickupGame

    public static enum PickupGame.PlayMode
extends java.lang.Enum<PickupGame.PlayMode>
    The play mode for the computer. Stupid mode picks out stones randomly. Smart mode is unbeatable if you don't know the pattern. Alternating mode goes between smart and stupid every turn. None is a special case, used mainly for input. When None is given to the constructor, the computer picks one of the other modes at random mode every time it plays.
